content: Want to know where your tax dollars are going in your community?? here is a link you can put your state, county and even town in to see where the money is going.. "http://www.recovery.org/ProjectResults.aspx?state=&county=&city="

title: Are Stimulus dollars being spent in your state, county..

content: The State of Oklahoma has something like 40 different highway projects which will be done using stimulus money. The number 4 priority on that list will be to replace the 100+ year old bridge which spans the Red River into Texas at Carpenter's Bluff. It's long, long overdue as the buttress on the Oklahoma side has fallen away and the piers (concrete encased wooden pilings) are rotten below the waterline. Thank goodness for the stimulus!

content: As is the norm for Michigan, what stimulus there is is all going downstate. No surprises there! It is not our belief or disbelief that can make or unmake the fact. ~ Thomas Paine

content: I don't know where the money is going. In this State the Legislature wants the residents to approve a sales tax hike. Doesn't matter to them that so many are unemployed (except government workers of course) they just want more money to waste. Just think, If someone with common sense took over the government here this could be the greatest State in the Union. We could pass a law to make it illegal to be a liberal. WE could do away with most of the stupid regulations tha bog down the achievers and reward people that save the taxpayers money etc. Sorry! I get a little carried away with my dreams.
